text: DELIVERING THE LOCAL PLAN 11.60 Social value should be considered early in the development process and applicants should engage with the councilâ€™s development management and infrastructure planning teams. 11.61 Part 2(b) requires the social value strategy to demonstrate how the development proposal will support social inclusion, economic well-being, equal opportunity, and community cohesion throughout its lifecycle. To demonstrate this, the strategy should provide a structure as to how social value will be implemented through each stage of the proposal, setting-out clear goals and implementation strategies and outlining measurable targets to ensure effective monitoring, reporting, and assessment.
